# HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy

**Enumeration**

Cookie acceptance policies implemented by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookieStorage] class.

## Declaration

```swift
enum AcceptPolicy
```

## Policies

- **HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy.always**: Accept all cookies.
- **HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy.never**: Reject all cookies.
- **HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy.onlyFromMainDocumentDomain**: Accept cookies only from the main document domain.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
